590760.name: Fantasy Grounds - Mini-Dungeon #021: Daenyr’s Return (PFRPG)
590760.description:
4-6 Characters of Levels 8-9

3,500 years have passed since the vampire Daenyr and his followers terrorized the countryside from his dark temple. His name now myth, his temple in ruins save for a few remaining chambers; no one recalls how or why this came to be. A mysterious cult has taken up residence
in the ruins, and rumors of blood rituals and a crimson god are spreading across the countryside, while many disappearances go unanswered.
Mini-Dungeons are small adventures for Pathfinder which are setting agnostic and are easily inserted anywhere in your campaign.
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included Pathfinder Ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included Pathfinder RPG and D&D 3.5/ OGL ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
